Description:
Some careers shine brighter than others.If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of an Engineering Manager In this role, you will:Look after Local Regulatory Engagement Stakeholder Engagement
Manage the engineering capability across the VS and acts as an overall leader for the team (PODs in VS / SVS).
Be responsible for tracking and driving analysis and design where this is done within the pod and not analysis design discipline, development, QA of the product (API) and releasing it into production.
Work in collaboration with delivery lead, API Design discipline for a given train as a three in a box construct.
Look after Continuous improvement of processes, tooling and engineering practices
Ensure that planned technical debts are tracked till closure.
Ensure the Sprint and PI goals are achieved and working with delivery management and RTE to address RAIDS.
Be responsible for Line management of engineering capability (developers, Scrum masters) in Value stream.Job Details
